net.sf.jclal.core

Interface IScenario

  • All Superinterfaces:
    JCLAL, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractScenario, PoolBasedSamplingScenario, StreamBasedSelectiveSamplingScenario

    public interface IScenario
extends JCLAL
    Interface for Active Learning Scenarios.
    Author:
    Oscar Gabriel Reyes Pupo, Maria del Carmen Rodriguez Hernandez, Eduardo Perez Perdomo

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void algorithmFinished()
      Used after completing the algorithm for the execution of any necessary actions, e.g., free memory, delete temporary files, etc.
      void evaluationTest()
      Evaluation test.
      IBatchMode getBatchMode()
      The batch mode strategy used, it allows to define which of the selected unlabelled instances will be labelled
      IOracle getOracle()
      Get the oracle used.
      IQueryStrategy getQueryStrategy()
      Get the active learning strategy used
      void instancesSelection()
      Select the most informative instances according to the scenario, the query strategy and the batch mode.
      void labelInstances()
      Label instances.
      void setBatchMode(IBatchMode batchMode)
      The batch mode strategy used, it allows to define which of the selected unlabelled instances will be labelled.

      Set the oracle.

      String representation

      Perform the training phase.
      void updateLabelledData()
      Update labeled data.

    • Method Detail

      • instancesSelection

        void instancesSelection()
        Select the most informative instances according to the scenario, the query strategy and the batch mode. Stores the selected indexes of the instances in the query strategy.

      • getQueryStrategy

        IQueryStrategy getQueryStrategy()
        Get the active learning strategy used
        Returns:
        Query strategy.

        Parameters:

        String representation
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:

      • getOracle

        IOracle getOracle()
        Get the oracle used. It allows to define how the selected instances will be labeled.
        Returns:
        The oracle

      • setOracle

        void setOracle(IOracle oracle)
        Set the oracle. It allows to define how the selected instances will be labeled.
        Parameters:
        oracle - The oracle to use

      • getBatchMode

        IBatchMode getBatchMode()
        The batch mode strategy used, it allows to define which of the selected unlabelled instances will be labelled
        Returns:
        The batch mode used

      • setBatchMode

        void setBatchMode(IBatchMode batchMode)
        The batch mode strategy used, it allows to define which of the selected unlabelled instances will be labelled.
        Parameters:
        batchMode - The bacth mode to use

      • algorithmFinished

        void algorithmFinished()
        Used after completing the algorithm for the execution of any necessary actions, e.g., free memory, delete temporary files, etc.
